name: Collect the Coins (Mikel Dadá)
description:
Collect all the coins, show that you can reach a million, coins from Argentina, a country where there are fewer and fewer of them, collect them quickly before they lose their value.

 

Touch the coins on the screen to add up your score.


| ONLY FOR ANDROID DEVICES |  Collect the Coins™   Mikel Dadá  2022
